overview: Elder White's movie-star good looks and winning smile have made him popular with the other missionaries and his leaders. Everyone is sure he'll be an important church leader one day. But just when he thinks he has figured out missionary life, another boy tells him the church is actually run by a group of men known as The Order. Thus begins an erotic adventure behind secret doors and in the hidden rooms of the Mormon temple, during which Elder White proves his worthiness by submitting to the sexual desires of the brethren.
title: Elder White: Chapters 1-4
